{"id":1096587944,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1699713777,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1096587944/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Distribute Candies Among Children I","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int distributeCandies(int n, int limit) {\n        int validWays=0,lim1=min(n,limit);\n        for(int i=0;i<=lim1;i++) {\n            int lim2=min(n-i,limit);\n            for(int j=0;j<=lim2;j++) {\n                int k=min(n-i-j,limit);\n                if(i+j+k==n) validWays++;\n            }\n        }\n        return validWays;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"distribute-candies-among-children-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
